tool.name: JMpwd2matrix
tool.description: : Convert JoinMap pair-wise file to a tabulated matrix
tool.help:
**Overview**
This program takes a pairwise file generated by JoinMap_ (.pwd file in the folder created by joinmap) and returns two matrixes:
* a matrix containing pairwise LOD score
* a matrix containing pairwise recombination frequencies
.. _JoinMap: https://www.kyazma.nl/index.php/mc.JoinMap
